bio: Socket is an interoperability protocol bringing seamless connectivity across blockchains. Applications build on Socket to power secure data and asset transfers.
contributionDescription:
Socket is an interoperability protocol that powers seamless asset & data transfers for apps across blockchains. 70+ wallets & apps including Metamask, Coinbase Wallet, Bungee, Synthetix, Polynomial, Kwenta, Lyra, Rainbow & Zerion leverage Socket for various cross-chain use cases.
Here are our contributions to Optimism:

- Enabled onboarding to Optimism right within 30+ wallets, not just from Mainnet but 10+ chains.
- Improved cross-chain UX for 10+ Optimism native apps including top options and perp protocols with our open-source 'Socket Plugin'
- Refuel, our public good to Optimism enables users to receive gas tokens, with no extra fees
- Day 0 bridging support across our 100+ ecosystem for OP-Stack chains like Base, Zora, etc.
- Built OP-Stack with Aevo to bring zero-cost L2<>L2 bridging

contributionLinks.description: Bringing bridging to Optimism to millions of wallet users of Metamask
Open-Source bridge widget for developers, used across Synthetix ecosystem
Refuel - public good for free gas top-ups to new users on Optimism
SuperBridge for OP-Stack, launching with Aevo
Day 0 bridging support to Base across 100+ Socket Apps

impactDescription:
Over the last 2 years, Socket has worked to eliminate one of the biggest problems hindering user onboarding and protocol adoption on Optimism. Along with our 100+ ecosystem, we powered seamless cross-chain experiences right within apps, removing any friction to try Optimism.
Here is our impact so far:
- Bridged $1B+ volume in 2 years across Metamask, Zapper, Zerion, Slingshot, Bungee, Layer3 & 30+ apps
- Onboarded 1.5M+ wallets with a simplified 1-click onboarding into Optimism on top OP native apps including Synthetix, Kwenta, Lyra & Polynomial
- Facilitated 600K+ gas top-ups to Optimism via our public good Refuel
- Facilitated 125K+ transfers to Base & Zora supercharging OP-Stack growth
- SuperBridge to Aevo facilitated 10K+ zero-cost transfers, pushing one step closer to Superchain

impactMetrics.description: Refuel top-ups for gas on Optimism
Wallets using Socket to bridge to OP
Bridge TVL locked on SuperBridge to Aevo

fundingSources.description: Unused by Socket. Directed to users via rebates & 100+ apps enabling OP bridging
